gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 89, Hornets 86
gameRecap.excerpt: The Blazers snap a 10-game losing streak as they defeat the Hornets, 89-86. Deandre Ayton led Portland with 24 points and 16 rebounds while Scoot Henderson (22 points, 10 assists) and Jabari Walker (14 points, career-high 22 rebounds) added 36 points. Brandon Miller led Charlotte with 21 points in the loss. Portland moves to 20-56 as Charlotte goes to 18-58.
